data.text: These are sayings/messages that God gave to Agur, the son of Jakeh.
It seems that I am very stupid;
I have not learned how to become wise
But let me say this:
Everything that God has said is true;
Do not add to (OR, change) what God has said;
God, I ask you to do two things for me;
Help me never to lie or deceive people
because if I become rich,
Do not ◄slander/say bad things about► a worker to his boss;
I will list four kinds of evil things that people do:
Some people think that they are perfect,
Some people are very proud;
Some people act very cruelly toward others;
Leeches are always wanting more blood to suck;
The place where the dead people are;
Those who [SYN] make fun of their fathers
There are four things that are wonderful to me,
How eagles fly in the sky,
This is what a woman who ◄is not faithful to/does not have sex only with► her husband does:
There are four things that no one in the world can tolerate:
What a slave does who becomes a king,
what a woman who is hated does when she gets married,
There are four animals on the earth that are small, but they are very wise:
Ants are not strong,
Rock badgers also are not strong,
Locusts do not have a king,
Lizards/Geckos are very small and you can hold them in your hand,
There are four animals that strut around and look very impressive while they walk [DOU]:
Lions, which are stronger than all other animals
male goats, strutting roosters,
If you have acted foolishly, exalting yourself,
If you churn milk, it produces butter/curds,
